Name: House Petrauskas
Details: A minor house originally from Smithon, House Petrauskas relocated to Mechdur shortly before the Liao evacuation of the system and was a member of its industrial oligarchy when it joined the new Aurigan Coalition in 2911. Its leader Ema Petrauskas has been appointed as Governor protempore of Smithon after the extermination of House Karosas by House Espinosa during the Aurigan Civil War.
